        url - The URL to check.

      • process

        public boolean process(java.util.List<CurlRequest> requests)
        Execute the given requests. Cookies are kept along this execution and the next ones associated to this processor.
        Parameters:
        requests - the request to proceed.
        Returns:
        true if the process succeed.
